pages.text: Ars Nouveau 1.18.1, Glide!$(li)Adds the Glide effect, fly with the elytra anytime!$(li)Crafting a spell now tells you all valid augments$(li)Adds a datapack blacklist for sylphs$(li)Fixes AOE on spell turret for place block, break$(li)Bows, wands, and swords now show the proper spell color$(li)Fixes potion crafting for wixies when multiple recipes exist

$(li)Fixes smelting not increasing the number of items smelted$(li)Summon Steed now takes leather and can summon multiple horses with AOE.$(li)Adds spawn eggs$(li)Delay is now cheaper$(li)Snare is now its own effect and is more potent.$(li)Fixes clipping on Sylphs.
